document.full_text: russian president dmitry medvedev gave prime minister vladimir putin a july 1 deadline on saturday to "initiate" the removal of top ministers from state company boards, including powerful putin deputy igor sechin.
document.title: kremlin to putin: start state board purge by july 1
lines_and_colors: russian president dmitry medvedev gave prime minister vladimir putin a july 1 deadline on saturday to "initiate" the removal of top ministers from state company boards, including powerful putin deputy igor sechin.
